name: Dual Blink
description:
A hastily made 2D platform game (1 hour more or less) for the Global Game Jam Athens 2022. 

Apologies for any frustrations. 

WASD controls and Space to jump.

Try using Firefox browser if the game does not run.

If the issue persist follow the steps in this link to activate WebGL on Firefox.

Don't expect anything interesting to happen.
